about.title: About Me
about.desc-line1: I'm a web developer based in Melbourne, with a passion for problem-solving.
about.desc-line2: I love to create things that are both beautiful and functional.
about.desc-line3: My graduation from the Monash Full-Stack Bootcamp has equipped me with essential skills in JavaScript, Node.js, React, SQL, and various JS-based frameworks and libraries.
about.desc-line4: I'm currently looking for a role as a junior developer, where I can continue to learn and grow as a developer.
about.desc-line5: Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to work together!

proj-1.title: Portfolio
proj-1.desc: Take a look at the code for this website!

proj-3.title: Serialised
proj-3.desc: A bot that checks if a manga chapter has been updated on MangaDex and sends a notification to Discord

proj-4.title: CreateReactAppProject
proj-4.desc: Graduation project for Monash Bootcamp made with the MERN stack. This project allowed me to graduate with a final score of 95.8%

proj-5.title: BetterReads
proj-5.desc: Book review app, that lets users search for books and leave reviews.

contact.title: Want to get in touch?
contact.desc: Send me a message, and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
